lines.text:
[Ken saves Ryu from Bison]
Ken, you're alive.
Hey, buddy, how have you been? We'll catch up on the reunion stuff later. We got something to take care of first. Like taking out the trash!
Yeah!

[throws his cape off]
You both seem bound and determined to meet destruction at my hands. So be it. I'll fight you on your own level! COME ON!
[Inside Ryu's Mind]
Ryu! What do you see beyond your fist?

[to Chun-Li]
Move your cute little butt before I run it over!

[Sensing Ryu from afar]
A power! But... where? Emanating from... a man!
Hey man. Half this money's yours.
Money?
Yes, my man. I might have lost the fight if you hadn't been around. Here, take it. Japanese fighters stick together... cause we're brothers!
Ken, what do you see beyond your fist?
My fate.
Not bad, or was it just luck?
You get the hell out of my way!
Well, now aren't you the big he-man? Now's the time to see just how legendary your fighting skills really are.
Move or I'll go through you!
All is talk and no action. You must not be too concerned about your friend who's probably dead by now.
I'LL SHOW YOU ACTION!
Hadouken!
We finally have visitors drop in and look at me, I'm just a mess.

[Listening to Bison's speech]
Oh God, I can't take it! I gotta kill this nut before I kill myself!
[after running headfirst into Balrog]
Hi there. And you are?
I'm the welcome wagon, it's nice to meet you friend.
Bison! I'm gonna rip your lousy heart out you filthy bastard!
Afraid I don't have one.
Hello captain. Are you ready to give me that heart transplant you mentioned?
Ready and waiting!
Have you ever felt the fighting spirit of another?
What's wrong, Guile? Thinking about your friend I killed? Try harder!
SONIC BOOM!
[about Ryu]
Any man strong enough to beat the crap out of Sagat is a man I want found.

[about Ryu]
Little maggot! No one has ever toppled me before! I clearly underestimated this man.
Shadowlaw's after you.

[PG-13 edited version]
Yahoo! They are some masterpieces of work, I am honored!

[after seeing a monitor cyborg]
I'll be a son of a bitch. What the hell is that, Tin Man on steroids?

[seeing Ryu fight]
Keep an eye on the new guy, he looks good.
I will turn you into the strongest fighter alive.
Buffalo, or whatever you're called, you're full of crap!
My hobby is to slowly peel the skin off the rabbits I catch, especially cute little bunnies like you. And my friend here is thirsty for blood.
Please master, give me the chance to prove myself against Ryu.
Remember, you are a Shadowlaw warrior now, Sagat. Put these commonplace thoughts aside.
But sir, we're talking about fighter's pride and my reputation here!
Fighter's pride, how dull. The world is now your arena not the street.

This walking mountain of muscle is called Sagat. He is a champion Muay Thai fighter and is considered a national hero in Thailand. Contestant number two is Balrog who's penchant for violent behavior got him permanently banned from boxing. From Spain we have Vega, he's savage, ruthless and a card-carrying psychopath.
My beautiful face is ruined! You bitch, I'll make you suffer!
Bison's ass is mine.
What do you mean, Captain?
I don't need Interpol's or anyone else's help to take him out.
Hey, Brush-Head! This is not a request!

[Dryly]
You want Bison destroyed, don't you? So what's the problem?

[shouts angrily at Guile]
Hey, Brush-head! This is not a request!
If you boys can't appreciate my music, then you boys better haul your sorry asses outta here!

[to Ken]
You worthless pile of excrement!

[to Sagat]
You will leave for New York immediately to take care of Cammy and Vega, if he's not dead already. He'll soon learn that Shadowlaw does not forgive mistakes.

[to Ken]
Your passion to fight stems from your competitiveness with Ryu. Hmmmm, just the quality I'm looking for. With my Psycho Power, I will increase and distort that emotion many times over.
You know, Guile, evil is a good career choice. It has a lot to offer.

[laughs evilly]
Even though you two amuse me, I must conclude this game. I have engagements to keep, and I can't be late.
Shadowlaw's after you.

[Unrated edited version]
Yahoo! They are some bad ass mothers. I am honored!
Shadowlaw's after you.

[unrated uncut version]
Yahoo! They are some bad ass motherfuckers, I am honored!
